title: Add support for text-anchor and baseline-shift
body:
This adds support for text-anchor and baseline-shift attributes for text / tspan elements. The only limitation I see so far, is, that I can only handle the single text-anchor attribute on the enclosing text element. I ignore text-anchor attributes on tspan elements. 
I implemented this after adding clipping support (see #18), so it contains those commits as well. If that is a problem, please advice how I should prepare those commits for you.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for the PR, I merged the other one so you should be able to rebase/merge.

comments.author: codedevote
comments.body: I merged the upstream changes. You should be able to merge the PR now.

comments.author: codedevote
comments.body: Just wanted to know if there is anything missing that prevents this PR from getting merged?

comments.author: codedevote
comments.body: Bumping this again. @mattleibow Not sure what is missing or if this project is already going to die. Some clarification would be greatly appreciated.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Thanks for the further changes. Apologies for the very long delay. I have been working on some new features in SkiaSharp as well as a few other projects.

I have merged the changes and should be in the next release.
